Is the series continuing

@BobCameHere101 Yup, this is kind of a sequel. Fuyuno in this series is the loli in Ane Taiken Shuukan. Apparently, her goal is to train Teppei(Kotetsu)'s cock into something like her older brother. Seems like the four of them have been fucking for three years at the most since Fuyuno mentioned her body is the same as Kanako(the loli)'s. I did a comparison side by side, but it maybe how the author's art style evolving. Also, it doesn't seem like we'll be getting a continuation soon. The most recent update from Michiking is a cover (and maybe a story) for Kairakuten. This series is from Anthurium.
